code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ActionButton from'./ActionButton';import FormField from'./FormField';import Card from'./Card';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function EmpireEditPanel(_ref){let{name,onCancel,empireInfo,saveEmpireInfo}=_ref;const info=empireInfo[name]||{};const[edit,setEdit]=useState(info);function handleChange(e){setEdit({...edit,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});}function handleSave(e){e.preventDefault();saveEmpireInfo(name,edit).then(()=>{onCancel();});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"empire-edit-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSave,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Lore:",name:"lore",as:"textarea",value:edit.lore||'',onChange:handleChange,rows:3}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Stats:",name:"stats",value:edit.stats||'',onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Ethics:",name:"ethics",value:edit.ethics||'',onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Civics:",name:"civics",value:edit.civics||'',onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Special Info:",name:"special",value:edit.special||'',onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'1rem',marginTop:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButton,{type:"submit",variant:"primary",className:"empire-save-btn",children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActionButton,{type:"button",variant:"secondary",className:"empire-back-btn",onClick:onCancel,children:"Cancel"})]})]})});}
